boardgame.name: Battletech Einsteigerbox
Battletech Introductory Box Set
Classic Battletech Introductory Box Set
boardgame.description: The Introductory Box Set is designed as the entry point into the game for new BattleTech players. The quick-start rules, which can be learned in under an hour, will have new players quickly slugging it out in the thirty-foot-tall war machines known as BattleMechs. The longer introductory rules provide more extensive guidelines for 'Mech movement and combat as well as construction rules for building or customizing your own (introductory-level) 'Mechs. Quick-start rules for vehicles and infantry are also included for players interested in combined-arms battles. Also included in the box set is a BattleTech universe book providing an overview of the game world, its history, and its factions. A set of 24 unpainted plastic 'Mechs, ready for play and suitable for painting, are accompanied by prefilled record sheets listing each 'Mech's capabilities. The set also includes maps, a painting and tactics guide, cardstock reference sheets, a universe poster map of the BattleTech universe, and two six-sided dice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The 2011 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Twenty-Fifth Anniversary Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; of the box set replaces the 2007 edition's thin paper maps with board game-style mounted maps, adds two _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;high-quality_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; plastic minis (a Thor and a Loki (and accompanying record sheets), and includes a brief guide detailing the BattleTech gaming system intended to introduce new players to the various products for the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Other introductory-level products:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech Starterbook: Sword and Dragon (Scenario book and sourcebook designed as a bridge between the box set and Total Warfare)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech: Technical Readout – 3039 (Companion _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;technical readout,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; with game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;fluff_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and unit statistics)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech: Record Sheets – 3039 (Print version of selected prefilled record sheets for TRO: 3039; also includes two scenarios and additional rules)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Battletech Hexpack: Lakes and Rivers (Additional maps and terrain overlays to add more variety to gameplay)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Intermediate-/standard-level products:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Battletech: Total Warfare (Full standard/tournament rules for BattleTech)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech: Tech Manual (Full construction rules for BattleTech units)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Classic Battletech: Technical Readout – 3050 Upgrade (Technical readout for the early Clan invasion period)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Battletech: Record Sheets: 3050 Upgrade (Print version of selected prefilled record sheets for TRO: 3050U; also includes two scenarios and additional rules)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

2007 Edition, half of the miniatures are painted in a basic grey scheme - the others are unpainted, components and box in excellent condition, also includes the following map sheets: Woodland Moonscape #1 Open Terrain #1 Open Terrain #2 Large Mountain #1 Large Mountain #2 Deep Canyon #1 Deep Canyon #2 Map Set #2, Scattered Woods Map Set #2, City Ruins (x2) Map Set #2, Mountain Lake (x2) Map Set #2, Desert Hills (x2) Map Set #3, Desert Sinkhole #1 Map Set #3, Desert Sinkhole #2 Map Set #3, Desert Mountain #1 Map Set #3, Desert Mountain #2 Map Set #3, City (Hills/Residential) #1 Map Set #3, City (Hills/Residential) #2 Map Set #3, Rolling Hills #2 (x2) Map Set #3, Rolling Hills #1 (x2) Map Set #4, Large Lakes #1 Map Set #4, Large Lakes #2 Map Set #4, River Delta/Drainage Basin #1 (x2) Map Set #4, River Delta/Drainage Basin #2 (x2) Map Set #4, City Street Grid/Park #1 Map Set #4, City Street Grid/Park #2 Map Set #4, Heavy Forest #1 Map Set #4, Heavy Forest #2 8 Official Battletech Maps that I could not find a label for
This item is reserved for auction winner tebald

Catalyst Game Labs (CYT3500B) Strap yourself into the ultimate suit of armor: the BattleMech. Thirty feet tall and weighing up to a hundred tons, this humanoid engine of destruction is a walking arsenal with enough firepower to level a city block. The BattleTech game system takes you into the world of the 31st Century, where war has become a way of life. You are a MechWarrior. You are in command of the most powerful machine on the battlefield, and hold the fate of empires in your hand! Improved reprint of 24 newly molded plastic miniatures representing core BattleMechs, including 2 high-quality figures: Mad Cat _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; BattleMaster. Everything needed to leap into the action of one of the best-selling adventure games of all time!
